text: Tigers, Framber Valdez Agree To Three-Year Deal - MLB Trade Rumors

text: Most Preventable Cancers Are Linked to Just Two Lifestyle Habits - ScienceAlert

text: Darius Garland bids farewell to Cleveland, closing a seven-year chapter - Cleveland.com

text: After crushing protests, Iran's supreme leader now tries to avert a U.S. attack - PBS

text: Measles Is Causing Brain Swelling in Children in South Carolina - WIRED
